turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Google, order me some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the closest Starbuck's on 1st Ave in Seattle?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a Starbuck's on 1st & University Reserve located at 1305 1st Ave., is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. What would you like to order from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order me 3 cherry mocha's, each with whipped cream and all venti sizes..

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you want 3 cherry mocha's with whipped cream with all being venti sizes. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk for your beverages?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 with Soy milk, the other with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you said two with Soy milk, 1 with 2% milk. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is there anything else you would like added to your beverages?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order from this Starbucks location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, do you have any croissants available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, this location does have croissants available. How many would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just need two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You said two, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you order 3 venti cherry mochas, 2 with Soy milk and 1 with 2% milk, and 2 croissants, was that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready and available to pick up within 15 to 20 minutes. Was there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Goodbye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, goodbye.
